analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#132-133) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#137-139)

Reentrancy in LOCIcredits.buyCreditsAndSpend (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#349-352):
	External calls:
	- increaseCredits(_id,_value,_reason,_register) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#350-351)
	- reduceCredits(_id,_spend,_reason,_register) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#351)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- users (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#351)

Reentrancy in LOCIcredits.buyCreditsAndSpendAndRecover (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#354-361):
	External calls:
	- buyCreditsAndSpend(_id,_value,_reason,_register,_spend) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#356-359)
	- reduceCredits(_id,getCreditsFor(_id),_reason,_recover) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#359-360)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- users (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#359-360)

LOCIcredits.ownerRecoverTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#458-461) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokensRemaining) (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol)
BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/9/0xc60de1a27ae8395b7c2a0034aa060ed4d31b39aa.sol#132-133)
